p: We account only for GHG emissions related to farm management, and do not account for processing or transport after the farm-gate. GHG emissions up to the farm gate are reported in CO 2 equivalent (CO 2eq) per ha of crops and per head for livestock using the 100 year global warming potentials used in national GHG accounting ( IPCC, 2006). For comparison, all results are also presented on a per kg production basis. GHG emissions were also converted to kg CO 2eq kcal −1 using FAO (2001) data for the energy content of the food commodities.
